Just a little fun thing that leads to a ton of fun fooling around with it.

DOWNLOAD (Mediafire)

Short Info:

Due to the light weight, it has some... interesting flight characteristics, though this allows it to glide surprisingly far, so it requires very little thrust so keep level flight (note that I used the control surface with the least lift and disabled movement for the wing). To fly just have the Kerbal enter the seat, and make sure to select "Control Here" on the Probe core under the seat to properly orient the nav ball. Also includes an SRB "launch" stage if you want to get some altitude or if you want to fly around some mountains.
